name: Magnetic (Dero)
description:
A short magnetic puzzle. 

Trijam#52

This took more than 3 hours but I had fun with the mechanics so here you go. Tho I missed to add sounds again :(.

Small update: Highlight on objects that can be magnatised and with vfx to indicate if its on or off.

Another update: Now you actually start from the start of the level

Tileset by this guy: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-robot-tileset
